programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley (Love Your Woman, Respect Your Man (Part 1)) S3 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Love Your Woman, Respect Your Man (Part 1)»In part one of "Love Your Woman, Respect Your Man," Pastor Bayless Conley explores what women need most from their husbands.

programme.title: Secret Lives of the Super Rich (Silicon Valley Smart House & The Most Expensive Hotel Suite In the World) S1 (n°606)
programme.desc: «Silicon Valley Smart House & The Most Expensive Hotel Suite In the World»Tour the nearly $35-million smart house in Silicon Valley's swankiest town. Check out the classic British trucks getting six-figure overhauls in the States. Behold the custom credit cards covered in nearly $40,000 worth of diamonds and gold. Take a bite of burger so rare, it costs a whopping $5,000. Check in to the world's most expensive hotel suite where Celine Dion, Rihanna, and Vladimir Putin have shelled out $82,000 a night for some unusual amenities. Feel the heat inside a sleek Miami mansion where the master suite comes with its very own water slide. Go for a drive in the futuristic four-wheelers that are part golf cart, part luxury sedan. Scope out a $49 million mountain mansion in Aspen. And get a ticket to ride with John Lennon's vintage Mercedes Benz that recently sold at auction for nearly $250,000.

programme.title: Open de Hilton Head
programme.desc: The first post-Masters stop on the schedule now comes with a new boost as one of this season's designated events. Masters champion Jon Rahm, PLAYERS champion Scottie Scheffler and Rory McIlroy, the reigning FedExCup champ, add to their limited history at Harbour Town this week for the RBC Heritage.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Naked Greed: Celebrity Scam Artist) S1 (n°51)
programme.desc: «Naked Greed: Celebrity Scam Artist»Kenneth Ira Starr is a money manager. He courts celebrity client?Sylvester Stallone, Uma Thurman, and Wesley Snipes. But Starr doesn't stop there. He steals $30 million to buy his way onto Hollywood's A-list and live a life of luxury ... all in the name of love.

programme.title: NBC Nightly News
programme.desc: Join American journalist Lester Holt as he provides a comprehensive report on the latest national and international stories, featuring interviews with the relevant persons involved in the day's news. Lester and his guests offer adept analysis to help you make sense of the frantic stories emerging from the world of politics, economics and social issues. Nightly News also features a segment titled Making a Difference, where we celebrate ordinary Americans doing extraordinary deeds to benefit their surrounding local communities.
